HEADLINE:
Please find enclosed the transcript of the 27th AGM of the Company held on Tuesday, August 30, 2022 at 11:00 a.m. (IST). This will also be available on the Company's website.

NEWSSUB: Transcript Of 27Th Annual General Meeting Of Jubilant Foodworks Limited

HEADLINE: Pursuant to Regulation 30(6) read with Part A of Schedule III of the Listing Regulations, we wish to inform that the Transcript of Earnings Conference Call for Analysts and Investors held on July 28, 2022, with respect to the financial performance of the Company for Q1 FY23, is available on the Company's website.

Pursuant to Regulation 30(6) read with Part A of Schedule III of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform that the Transcript of Analyst and Investor Conference call for audited financial results of the Company for the financial year ended March 31, 2022, is also available on the Company's website al-information.
